p: All values are expressed as means ± SDs from at least three independent experiments. Statistical significance was determined by Student’s t-test when only two groups were compared or by one-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) when more than two groups were compared. Statistical analyses were performed using GraphPad Prism 7 (GraphPad Software, San Diego, CA, USA). * P < 0.05, ** P < 0.01 and *** P < 0.001 were considered to be statistically significant at different levels.
